Troubleshooting

Previous

 

  • Troubleshooting
  • Items not appearing in outbound sync
  • Related Article(s)

Items not appearing in outbound sync

Items are configured in view but are not coming in outbound sync.

1. Look in to the view Definition. 

Get view Definitioni:

API(Get): <<url>>/inventory/api/inventory/viewDefinition/?query="Name=Ship-to-Home"

 

2. Check if "MainTable" flag is true or false. Also get the view number.

3. If "MainTable" flag is true we need to see the availability status of the item.

API(Get): <<url>>/inventory/api/inventory/availabilityStatus/itemid/item.

 

If "MainTable" flag is false we need to see the availability status alt of the item.

API(Get): <<url>>/inventory/api/inventory/availabilityStatusAlt/itemid/item.

 

4. check the "availability status" or "availability status alt" in that check the value against the view number. The value should be 0,1,2

0 - out of stock

1 - limitedstock

2 - Available

If its null out bound sync won't include this item. 

5. To make this work. We need to do availability calculation job.

We need to have the following job in the system:

API: <<url>>/inventory/api/batch/jobTypeDefinition/save

{

    "JobTypeId": "availabilityCalculationJob",

    "JobTypeDescription": "Availability Calculation Job",

    "ChunkSize": "100",

    "JobType": "FUNCTIONAL",

    "StatusMonitorLevel": "NONE"

}

 

Trigger is:

<<url>>/inventory/api/batch/jobSchedule/triggerAdhoc 

{

                "JobTypeId":"availabilityCalculationJob"

}
